document_data.name: Duggan McKnuckles
document_data.mainbody:
'''Duggan McKnuckles''' was a dwarf with a yellow beard. He was the brother of [[Tred McKnuckles]]. He was killed in [[1370 DR]] when a band of [[orc]]s and [[frost giant]]s attacked the caravan in which he was travelling.


{{stub-person}}
